comment: The Thunderstorm Watch Face - just like the matching "live" wallpaper from the same developer - looks incredible, has LOADS of options to configure the watchface to your personal preferences and works flawlessly. If you like your mobile devices sharing a common theme, or you just want something that looks particularly flash, the Thunderstorm Watch Face should be one of the very first watch-faces you look at!
title: Works flawlessly with loads of personalization options!
